mapper.update: update TBL_USER set USERNAME= #{USERNAME} , USERID = #{USERID} , USERPW = #{USERPW} , USERADDRESS = #{USERADDRESS} , USERPHONENUMBER = #{USERPHONENUMBER} , USEREMAIL = #{USEREMAIL} , USERGENDER = #{USERGENDER} , USERROLE = #{USERROLE} , USERPOINT = #{USERPOINT} , NICKNAME = #{NICKNAME} , USERICON = #{USERICON} , USERDATE = #{USERDATE} where mno = #{mno}
